name: Guess The Picture (hassan mtayrek)
description:
Guess the Picture is a puzzle game. Each level contain a specific picture you should guess what this picture talk about a fill the empty space with the letters.

You can get help from friends through social media like WhatsApp, Facebook and more, or you can simply solve it by using coins.

you can use coins in three deferent ways. First you can solve the hull word, second you can delete letters from the letter box, Finally you can show a letter from the word.

Challenge your self and solve all the levels.
